tool_description: Validate the email address of your users at sign-up and get a risk score to help you eliminate fraud up-front, inform risk models and build customised workflows | Email Validation API
name: Email Validation
title: Email Validation

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: Email Validation
api_list.description:
Validate the email address of your users at sign-up and get a risk score to help you eliminate fraud up-front, inform risk models and build customised workflows | Email Validation API

Use get call on the left and pass the request id to fetch api call results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-validation14.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-validation14.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-validation14.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/async/verify_with_source/email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
